---
title: "values.yaml"
---

## High-level description
This YAML file contains configuration values for deploying Infisical, a secrets management platform, on Kubernetes. It defines parameters for the Infisical backend, ingress settings, and optional PostgreSQL and Redis deployments.

## Code Structure
The YAML file is structured into several main sections: common parameters, Infisical backend parameters, ingress configuration, and database configurations (PostgreSQL and Redis).

## Symbols

### Common parameters
#### Description
This section defines common parameters that can be used to override the release name and fullname.

#### Inputs
| Name | Type | Description |
|:-----|:-----|:------------|
| nameOverride | string | Override release name |
| fullnameOverride | string | Override release fullname |

### Infisical backend parameters
#### Description
This section configures the Infisical backend deployment, including image settings, replica count, and annotations.

#### Inputs
| Name | Type | Description |
|:-----|:-----|:------------|
| autoDatabaseSchemaMigration | boolean | Enable/disable automatic database schema migration |
| enabled | boolean | Enable/disable Infisical backend deployment |
| name | string | Name of the Infisical deployment |
| replicaCount | integer | Number of replicas for the Infisical deployment |
| image.repository | string | Docker image repository for Infisical |
| image.tag | string | Docker image tag for Infisical |
| image.pullPolicy | string | Image pull policy for Infisical |
| deploymentAnnotations | object | Annotations for the Infisical deployment |
| kubeSecretRef | string | Reference to a Kubernetes secret |

### Ingress
#### Description
This section configures the ingress settings for the Infisical deployment, including TLS and hostname configuration.

#### Inputs
| Name | Type | Description |
|:-----|:-----|:------------|
| enabled | boolean | Enable/disable ingress |
| ingressClassName | string | Ingress class name |
| annotations | object | Ingress annotations |
| hostName | string | Hostname for the ingress |
| tls | array | TLS configuration for the ingress |

### PostgreSQL
#### Description
This section enables or disables PostgreSQL deployment.

#### Inputs
| Name | Type | Description |
|:-----|:-----|:------------|
| enabled | boolean | Enable/disable PostgreSQL deployment |

### Redis
#### Description
This section enables or disables Redis deployment.

#### Inputs
| Name | Type | Description |
|:-----|:-----|:------------|
| enabled | boolean | Enable/disable Redis deployment |

## Configuration
| Option | Type | Default | Description |
|:-------|:-----|:--------|:------------|
| infisical.enabled | boolean | false | Enable/disable Infisical backend deployment |
| infisical.replicaCount | integer | 3 | Number of replicas for the Infisical deployment |
| infisical.image.tag | string | "latest" | Docker image tag for Infisical |
| ingress.enabled | boolean | true | Enable/disable ingress |
| ingress.ingressClassName | string | "nginx" | Ingress class name |
| ingress.hostName | string | "gamma.infisical.com" | Hostname for the ingress |
| postgresql.enabled | boolean | false | Enable/disable PostgreSQL deployment |
| redis.enabled | boolean | false | Enable/disable Redis deployment |

## Dependencies
| Dependency | Purpose |
|:-----------|:--------|
| cert-manager | Used for automatic TLS certificate management (inferred from ingress annotations) |

This YAML file serves as a configuration template for deploying Infisical on Kubernetes. It allows for customization of various aspects of the deployment, including the Infisical backend, ingress settings, and optional database deployments. The file is designed to be used with a Helm chart or similar Kubernetes deployment tool.
